name: GetDomainPrice
description:
Retrieve domain price and purchase period details.

Use this tool to obtain the cost of purchasing a specific domain and the duration of a single purchase period, replacing the deprecated endpoint for domain price checking.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: The domain name to check the purchase price for.

value_schema.description: The name of the domain for which the price needs to be checked.

parameters.name: domain_status_for_pricing
parameters.description: Specifies the domain status ('new', 'renewal', 'transfer', 'redemption') to check the price for.

value_schema.description: In which status of the domain the price needs to be checked.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The Team identifier for executing the request on behalf of a specific team. This is usually a unique string assigned to the team.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug_for_request
parameters.description: The slug identifier of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the domain for which the price needs to be checked.

value_schema.description: The name of the domain for which the price needs to be checked.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: In which status of the domain the price needs to be checked.

value_schema.description: In which status of the domain the price needs to be checked.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
